resources.string:
This app was taken during the Kotlin Essentials for Android course
 created by the Google Developers training team in Lesson 2 on Layouts.
 Initially it was suggested that you create a biography, however, this small text was made to explain about the app,
 or the short "biography" of the app.

 App overview
 In the AboutMe app, you can showcase interesting facts about yourself, or you can customize the app for a friend, family member, or pet.
 The app displays a name, a DONE button, a star image, and some scrollable text.
